simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para:
&dvicopy; reads a &DVI; file, expands any references to virtual fonts to base fonts, and writes the resulting &DVI; file. Thus you can use virtual fonts
virtual fonts resolving
even if your &DVI; processor does not support them, by passing the documents through &dvicopy; first.

Select pages to be copied.
The syntax for sel is: start [n], where start is the starting page specification
-select=sel
(for example 2 or 5.*.-2) and n (optional) is the maximum number of pages to be copied.
You can use up to 10 -select options. This option cannot be used together with -max-pages or -page-start.
